entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then light snow beginning this evening and ending after midnight. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
